alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 6:43AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lee County through 715 AM EDT... At 643 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lochmoor Waterway Estates to 23 miles west of Naples. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Bonita Springs, Lehigh Acres, East Dunbar, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Iona, Cypress Lake, San Carlos Park, McGregor, Pine Manor, Charleston Park, Lovers Key State Park, Olga, Buckingham, Villas, Three Oaks, and Page Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for southwestern Florida.
